text: i woke up feeling productive i went to work and decided to build my favorite resident at vacation home it took me a few hours but the finished design combined with their smile when they saw it made it all worthwhile it was rewarding and relaxing and thanks to animal crossing new horizons happy home paradise dlc i'm now spending my days on a tropical paradise flexing my creativity to help people build the vacation homes of their dreams [Music] happy home paradise lets you visit a resort archipelago to work at paradise planning a company that helps villagers build their very own vacation homes if that sounds like a familiar concept you probably played happy home designer on the 3ds back in 2015. your job is to recruit potential customers pick out a plot of land and then build a house based on specific themes and items the villager wants to contain such as an arcade cabinet for a villager that wants their home to look like an arcade or a tractor for a villager that wants to live on a farm

text: also eventually unlock the ability to call in specific villagers using animal crossing's extensive collection of amiibo cards you can invite villagers from your own island too though it requires a bit of bribery all these options make it easy for you to choose whom you build a vacation home for especially if one of your favorite villagers is currently living on your island the new skills and tricks you learn in the archipelago extend to your main island as well which means you can now offer to remodel and redecorate your villagers homes it's a bummer you can't resize rooms here but i love being able to give anybody's house a makeover without having to boot them out and then bring them back with an amiibo animal crossing new horizons happy home paradise is an exceptional piece of post-launch dlc it's fun to design something outside of your own home or island and being given simple instructions to build around has tapped into my creativity in a way that new horizons previously did not
